alert.note: Alert for Barry; Calhoun; Eaton; Kalamazoo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:32AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Calhoun, southern Barry, northeastern Kalamazoo and southern Eaton Counties through 430 AM EDT... At 332 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gull Lake, or 12 miles northwest of Battle Creek, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charlotte... Eaton Rapids... Bellevue... Richland... Level Park-Oak Park... Gull Lake... Assyria... Kalamo... Olivet... Brookfield... Delton... Banfield... Prairieville... Hickory Corners... Dowling... Pine Lake... Fitch H Beach Airpor... Skyview Estates Airp... Bedford... Lacey... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
